TopicTitle: Upon Reverting Flight to Launch, Vessels Have No Stages or Crew [Stock Vessels Mentioned]

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.3 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 11 | CPU: Intel i7-13700K | GPU: 4070ti | RAM: 32GB DDR5

 

Severity: medium

Frequency: medium, happens most of the time

Launching stock vessels and reverting flight to launch yields the vessels with no stages or crew.

Steam shows my GPU is integrated but can confirm game uses 4070ti.
